sunlight: Full sun only if soil kept moist
description: Boxwood (Buxus sempervirens 'Myrtifolia') is an amazing addition to any landscape, perfect for areas needing year-round greenery. It is an evergreen shrub with small, glossy, dark green leaves, and a dense, compact form. The foliage of Boxwood produces a lush backdrop for your garden. Its hardiness and ability to thrive in nearly any type of soil make it ideal for any garden or patio area. In addition to its beautiful leaves, boxwood produces fragrant yellow flowers during the spring. It can easily be pruned and shaped to form hedges, mazes, or creative sculptures in your outdoor space. For many, this small shrub is a must-have to keep their landscape looking magnificent all year round.
